message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its high value, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us. I propose a price of $11000 for this exceptional item. Thank you for considering our offer.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $9500? I believe this would be a fair compromise.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to consider your proposal. For the product, I would like to propose a price of $10500. This still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while accommodating your financial considerations.

Hello Alice, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I appreciate your effort to accommodate my budget. Based on my research and understanding of market prices, I would like to propose a final offer of $10000 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our interests.
